model
Class ModelDriver

java.lang.Object
  model.ModelDriver

public class ModelDriver
extends java.lang.Object

All Forr� model component has an object of this class. A model is defined by its input parameters, a solve method and a number of external views. This interface provides methods for setting the input parameters, solving the model and getting external views. natenate

The methods of every implementation of this interface should return either Serializable or Datatype objects. In the former case, remote invocation returns its result by value. Otherwise, the result is returned by (remote) reference.

Author:
Ricardo Corrêa (correa@lia.ufc.br)

                            WorkspaceDriver wdriver,

Bind a uses port of this model described by a specified port name to the specified provides port. This method is invoked by the location driver.

providesPortName - modelName.portName
